Broken. Cannot load image neither to Daemon tools, nor to Alcohol.

This torrent is multi-part ZIPPED, not rarred. Thus, the filename MUST be .zip or else it will not extract properly (verified using winrar). The .zip file will extract a multipart rar, which you can extract with winrar, giving you the proper 258MB .bin file.

When using DAEMON, mount using the .BIN file, NOT the .CUE file. (this is how I always mount images anyway). This works for me.

Further to this, this game uses a 16-bit installer, so you will need to use a 32-bit version of windows to install it. Theoretically once it's installed, you should be able to play it on a 64-bit OS. I will test this.

Confirmed - game plays on Windows 7 64-bit without compatibility mode required - it just needs to be installed to a location using a 32-bit OS. Intro video bugs for me, but hammer a few buttons and you'll get to the menu.
